name: psake
description: Build with the psake build system
author: Guillaume Rouchon

inputs.name: buildFile
inputs.label: Psake File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the psake build script to execute.

inputs.name: tasks
inputs.label: Task(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. A comma-separated list of task names to execute. If not specified, the default task will run.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Optional. A comma- or newline-separated list of parameters to be passed into the build script.
Eg: param1=value1, param2=value2

inputs.name: properties
inputs.label: Properties
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Optional. A comma- or newline-separated list of properties to be passed into the build script.
Eg: prop1=value1, prop2=value2

inputs.name: framework
inputs.label: Framework
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the .NET framework you want to use during build. You can append x86 or x64 to force a specific framework. If not specified, x86 or x64 will be detected based on the bitness of the PowerShell process.

inputs.name: nologo
inputs.label: No Logo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not display the startup banner and copyright message.
